content.rendered:
636 Features and Benefits

Green Machines 636 Series Air Sweeper is easy to operate and allows any-time cleaning in public spaces

  • Efficiently sweep footpaths and other pedestrian spaces without disrupting patrons, employees or guests
  • Clean where other large city cleaning machines cannot – on footpaths, under planters, round benches, and in other hard-to-reach areas
  • Put operators at ease with all-round visibility and easy-to-use ergonomic controls

Key machine features of the Green Machines 636 Series Air Sweeper

  • CloudMaker® technology and the three-stage dust filtration clean and protect the environment while using 70% less water than traditional street sweepers
  • Vari-track™ extendable front track provides stable 20 mph / 32 km transport speed to allow operators to arrive at the job quickly
  • Four-wheel drive and fully independent suspension give the operator a quality ride

Choose the ideal options to customise the Green Machines 636 Series Air Sweeper

  • Colour closed-circuit television (CCTV) reversing camera allows operator to see obstacles behind the sweeper to improve safety as the sweeper moves in reverse
  • On-board pressure washer blasts debris away in hard-to-reach spaces
  • Air conditioned cab improves operator comfort and reduces fatigue in hot weather conditions

DOWLOAD PRODUCT OVERVIEW

excerpt.rendered: Green Machines 636 Series air sweeper manoeuvres easily in congested public spaces to quietly clean with minimal dust any time of day.
